title: Winston-Salem fertilizer plant at risk of explosion, thousands living within 1-mile radius evacuated - WRAL News
content:
1. Winston-Salem fertilizer plant at risk of explosion, thousands living within 1-mile radius evacuated  WRAL News
  2. Weaver Fertilizer plant fire update | WATCH LIVE  WFMY News 2
  3. Fertilizer plant fire causes evacuations in North Carolina  FOX Carolina News
  4. Winston-Salem fire: Explosion feared at fertilizer plant, thousands of residents urged to evacuate  WXII12 Winston-Salem
  5. People within 1 mile of fire at Weaver Fertilizer Plant in Winston-Salem asked to evacuate due to possibility of explosion  WGHP FOX8 Greensboro
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: People within a one-mile radius of a Winston-Salem fertilizer plant were asked to evacuate following a fire on Monday night.
